DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card enters your hand, discard pile, or is exhausted, increase by #b1. At the start of your turn, decrease by #b15.
When you have the corresponding #yWind #ySpeed, consume them and trigger the effect, if you have multiple, trigger them in order.
Reduce the damage you take from enemy attack by #b50%.
When you still have the corresponding #yWind #ySpeed, consume them and trigger the effect continuously (up to #b10 times).
A copy of the card with #yExhaust and #yEthereal.
You must have at least #b1 #yFlight to use this card.
Enemy will be #yStunned when has #b3 Tremble.
Whenever this enemy takes damage, gain #b2 #yWind #ySpeed, and lose #b1 stack at the end of your turn.
Upon death, give you #yFlight equal to the number of stacks.
Order: The Wind of Soaring, The Wind of Warfare, The Wind of Resistance, The Wind of Healing.
Order: The Wind of Soaring, The Wind of Warfare, The Wind of Resistance, The Wind of Healing.
